title: (x) Paul Miller Infiniti ads - FF Meta Cond {Jan}
content:
HI... I'm trying to figure out the font used in the Paul Miller Infiniti ads all over NYC right now. They also use it on their site - see sample for the word 'Selections' Thanks!   
   
 ![Sample](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524130900im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/69172.jpg)
author: yaazmeena
